item.title: Privacy Policy
item.author: web@bochkarev.io (Alexey A. Bochkarev)
item.description: This is a private site hosting mostly my notes on various topics (which are mostly of interest to myself, perhaps), so I do not inherently need any users' data. Therefore, while I am definitely not an expert on how the underlying technologies work, I do take deliberate efforts to maximize the privacy of this website. To the best of my knowledge, it “interacts” with your data in a very minimalist fashion (if at all), as described below.
